page.title: 13Youth Club and Football Club
page.content: The{Youth Club}has been running for four years. Meetings are held in the old school on Wednesday except for the first week in every month when there is a disco on the Friday. There are 25 regular members aged from 7 to 18. The charge is 20p for club night and 40p for the disco. Up to 200 come for the disco. Club activities include: pool, darts snooker, table tennis, Atari and sometimes volley ball. { { Woolley Moor Sports Football Club} was formed in 1977. There are 14 players and 3 officials. Most of the team live in Woolley Moor and some are friends who live nearby. Every game they play, they pay 50p levy for insurance against accidents. The team plays on the Jubilee Fields.They are in div.1 of the local Sunday league.
